reviewTitle: The worst smart watch from Firebolt
reviewDescription:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    








  
  
    Â I was using various smart watches from Firebolt and I ordered this model with high expectation. But though it looks good, it failed impress me from day one. The battery life is extremly poor compared to their earlier models and within few weeks its health monitors failed to work! Though there is a 1 year warranty I am not able to get any proper guidance from Amazon in this regard. I wouldnt recommend this product any more.This product first stopped its health monitoring functions with in few weeks and now it does not even switch on. The warranty request is another big pain as they need video to be made with in 20 mb yet show all what they want. I had so far purchased about 5 smart watches from them through amazon but last three are the worst. Poor battery and over heating and now it stopped working in less than a month. Dont buy this product

reviewTitle: A high quality game changer cellular watch
reviewDescription: If one is  clear about their  requirements and the budget .....most of the the times one is able to get a good value for money deal.If you want an effective cellular calling watch with a health suite with made in india 1 year warranty and nothing more this is the one for you .The battery is good and compared with 250 mah bt phones it is way much better .The tft screen is rather impressive and smooth .The extra cost here is an independent new connection and a nano simThe only negative is the first time set up and it takes several reboots but once it is synced ...it is solid performance .As for the app it must be scanned from the watches qr code by the mobile phone ...the FM active act is useless and does not bind to the watch .Final verdict ....just go for this high quality cellular watch ...it is a game changer at 2000 .7 Jan 2025 my second purchase ....highly recommended for those who want a non android calling watch with health suite. As for customer service they have tech support team that responds and assists very well via email only .

reviewTitle: Smartwatch touch issues within couple of weeks of purchase
reviewDescription: Purchased the Fire Boltt 4G Pro Volte Calling Smartwatch from Amazon on 29th November 2024 (delivered 30th Nov).In less than 1 month after purchasing the watch, there are issues with it including:  1. Primary and big issue: Touch screen not working correctly. It does not work in some parts of the screen and the touch response is unpredictable. As a result, simple operations are diffficult to do, e.g., not possible to pick up incoming calls by pressing the green call-accept button, and not possible to disconnect calls by pressing the red call-disconnect button. Touch reponse not working in some parts of the screen (except on the sides).  2. SIM stopped getting recognised, even though it worked fine for the first 2 weeks or so. It is now recognised again, but stops working in between - behaviour is erratic.I tried contacting Fire Boltt Customer Care on 3 different numbers (including the one provided on product packaging, plus 2 other numbers found on the internet), as well as emailed to the support email address provided on product packaging. None of these methods worked. I then got an email saying I need to register the concern on their complaint portal, which I did. Overall, this has been a poor experience.

reviewTitle: Best watch for calling with sim
reviewDescription: I am very happy to have it , with lowest price among all and very satisfied with this watch . All functions are good , no hang while using

Impressive Budget Smartwatch Firebolt 4G .The Firebolt 4G Pro Smart Watch is an impressive budget-friendly option that packs a punch. With its vibrant 1.7-inch display, responsive touchscreen interface, and sleek design, it's hard to believe it's priced  The 4G connectivity and SIM card functionality make it a convenient option for those who want to stay connected without their phone.Battery life is impressive, lasting up to 5 days on a single charge. The water-resistant design provides peace of mind, and the watch's fitness tracking features, including step tracking and calorie counting, are useful.However, the limited app selection and lack of built-in GPS tracking for workouts are notable drawbacks. Heart rate monitoring accuracy can also be inconsistent.The Firebolt 4G Pro Smart Watch is an excellent value-for-money option for those seeking a basic smartwatch experience. While it may not rival high-end smartwatches, it's a solid choice for those on a budget.If you're looking for an affordable smartwatch with basic features, the Firebolt 4G Pro is worth considering. However, if you prioritize advanced fitness tracking or a wider app selection, you may want to explore other options.

reviewTitle: Supports 4G calling only. No Bluetooth or wifi
reviewDescription: Hugely disappointed with this 4G SIM supported smart watch.It does support 4G volte calling. Nothing else, apart from other smart watch functions.It is just like a small feature phone with basic smart watch functions like SPO2, blood pressure monitoring etc.For phone calling functions, you will have to use the watch itself. No Bluetooth or wifi support.To see weather etc, you will have to connect your phone with the app.After first recharging, battery found discharging quite fast. 15% in 30 -40 minutes.Wrist band is quite good.Various display faces are available. In some display face, you can see the mobile signal strength bars.
Nice watch for this price range

This is an average product, if you just need the call feature - making & receiving calls are easy and mic & speaker working good. But, you will be disappointed if you want more from this product. The charge doesn't last for even a day. The app is also basic with nothing much to add to the value of the smart watch.

reviewTitle: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT AT ALL.
reviewDescription: I purchased the Fireboltt smartwatch 4G pro on October 14, 2024, and it was delivered the next day, October 15, 2024. Despite being a brand-new product, the smartwatch stopped working within just a few days of use, not even lasting 15 days. I reported the issue on their portal on November 5, 2024, under Ticket ID: 3774887, and since then, I have been persistently following up to resolve this matter. I am extremely disappointed with both your product and customer service. Despite the smartwatch being under a one-year warranty, my request for a replacement has been denied. To make matters worse, there are no call centers, and all communication is handled via email. However, it seems that my emails are not even being read, as I consistently receive generic, copy-pasted responses that do not address my specific concerns.I strongly advise others NOT TO PURCHASE Fireboltt products.

reviewDescription: After 2 months of usage following are the pros and cons of thisPros:Battery is decent for usageSim card features are okThe gui has multiple screens which u can keep animation is decentCalling snd voice is supported via simConsExtremely delicate one minor fall led to edge of the screen Crack and device is now not charging due to screen leakWarranty claim is pain taking don't have any support on the website and customer supprt no are not responded.Am struggling to find customer crevice center.When u try to register on their portal it forces to give a good rating first to get warranty support. Not sure thud is ethical to force a customer to give good ratingSim card detection takes time and voice clarity on Sim is not that greatNo geo tracking is not accurateMobile app setup u need to download from a direct link not on playstore reasonable tech people can only install.

My ordered product was faulty and its screen had visible lines. After complain with Firebolt, they changed the product. The replacement was also faulty and its side buttons were not working.Again I complained and they fixed the product. Today on Sep 23, 2024 repaired product has heating problem and had temperature of 42 Degree Celsius.DONT BUY THIS PRODUCTHere is the response from them, they are expecting to forget money and keep faulty product.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------BolttNov 12, 2024, 12:47â¯PM (5 days ago)to meDear Valued Customer,Greetings of the day!!Thank you for contacting Fire-Boltt.Thank you for reaching out to us regarding the replacement of the product you previously received. We appreciate your continued trust in our company and our products.After carefully reviewing your request and considering our company policies, we regret to inform you that we are unable to proceed with the replacement of the previously replaced product. Our company policy dictates that replacements are offered only in cases where the original product is found to be defective or fails to meet quality standards upon initial receipt.We understand your disappointment and frustration with the situation, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please know that we take your feedback seriously, and we are continuously striving to improve our products and services.If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We value your business and are here to assist you in any way we can.Thank you for your understanding.

reviewTitle: Don't waste time money and efforts
reviewDescription: Watch doesn't work as in the sim card is not detected. Tried with various sim cards. It might be a manufacturing defect. Wanted to get a replacement but the process is lengthy and complicated. It can't be done through Amazon. Fireboltt s customer support number is not working, if you try to get a replacement through then their website doesn't show this model in their database so you are unable to proceed with the complaint. Only option left is visiting their service centre. So the overall experience is utter disappointment.
